messages.title: Contact me
messages.body: I have a job for you

actualities.title: Bientôt le déconfinement
actualities.content: Reprenons le travail et profitons bien du soleil
actualities.author: Jean

onboarding.title: Find lost Alumni
onboarding.contents: Members of the network can update their profile whenever they wish. Data can easily be exported and give you real time access to statistics such as employability rates, activity on the platform and many other metrics.

onboarding.title: Engage your alumni network
onboarding.contents: Alumni can update their profile whenever they wish. This means you will always have the most up to date information relating your former students

onboarding.title: Boost your alumni employability
onboarding.contents: Help your members find a job, an internship or an apprenticeship, with the job board and recruiters accounts.
